name: sap-leonardo
description: NPM module for SAP Leonardo Machine Learning Foundation - Functional Services https://api.sap.com/package/SAPLeonardoMLFunctionalServices

scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-test
scripts.test: npm run build-all && npx istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -s 30000 -t 30000 dist/test/test_*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | npx coveralls
scripts.coverage: npm run build-all && npx istanbul cover _mocha --report html -- -s 30000 -t 30000 dist/test/test_*.js
scripts.lint: npx tslint src/*.ts && npx tslint test/*.ts && npx eslint examples/*.js

author: Lars Gregori <github@larsgregori.de>
